Returns the current status of an async operation.

AcStorConfiguration.description: AcStorConfiguration is a custom resource that defines the configuration for a storage system.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

AcStorConfigurationListResult.description: The response of a AcStorConfiguration list operation.

value.description: The AcStorConfiguration items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

AcStorConfigurationProperties.description: Defines the properties of the AcStorConfiguration resource.

diskMountPoint.description: The mount point for the disk.

diskCapacity.description: The capacity of the disk, including storage unit (e.g., 60Gi).

createStoragePool.description: Configuration for creating a storage pool.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

AuthConfig.description: Authentication settings for secure access to storage.

secretName.description: Name of the K8s secret storing credentials. Required for SAS/KEY/CONNECTION_STRING.

secretNamespace.description: Namespace of the K8s secret storing credentials.

AuthSysConfig.description: Unix-like ownership of the subvolume via UID/GID.

EdgeIngestPolicy.description: EdgeIngestPolicy is a custom resource that defines the configuration for edge ingest policies.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

EdgeIngestPolicyListResult.description: The response of a EdgeIngestPolicy list operation.

value.description: The EdgeIngestPolicy items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

EdgeIngestPolicyProperties.description: Defines the properties of the EdgeIngestPolicy resource.

ingest.description: Defines the configuration for ingest policies.

eviction.description: Defines the configuration for eviction policies.

onDelete.description: Possible values: trigger-immediate-ingest or abandon. Can be extended to other string values.

values.name: trigger-immediate-ingest
values.description: Trigger immediate ingestion for linked EdgeSubVolumes.

values.name: abandon
values.description: Abandon linked EdgeSubVolumes without any action.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

EdgeStorageConfiguration.description: EdgeStorageConfiguration is a custom resource that defines the configuration for edge storage settings.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

EdgeStorageConfigurationListResult.description: The response of a EdgeStorageConfiguration list operation.

value.description: The EdgeStorageConfiguration items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

EdgeStorageConfigurationProperties.description: Defines the properties of the EdgeStorageConfiguration resource.

defaultDiskStorageClasses.description: The default disk storage class(es) to be used for edge volumes. Must not be empty and is immutable once set.

serviceMesh.description: DEPRECATED field for backward compatibility. Which service mesh to use.

workloadIdentity.description: Object containing optional workload identity information.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

EdgeSubvolume.description: EdgeSubvolume is a custom resource that defines the configuration for a subvolume.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

EdgeSubvolumeListResult.description: The response of a EdgeSubvolume list operation.

value.description: The EdgeSubvolume items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

EdgeSubvolumeProperties.description: Defines the properties of the EdgeSubvolume resource.

edgevolume.description: Name of the EdgeVolume that this subvolume references.

auth.description: Optional authentication config for certain subvolumes.

storageaccountendpoint.description: Blob storage endpoint, for example: https://mysa.core.windows.net

authSys.description: Optional Unix-like ownership info (UID/GID) for the subvolume.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

EdgeVolume.description: EdgeVolume is a custom resource for defining an edge volume.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

EdgeVolumeListResult.description: The response of a EdgeVolume list operation.

value.description: The EdgeVolume items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

EdgeVolumeProperties.description: Defines the desired state (spec) of the EdgeVolume resource.

requestedSize.description: Size of the EdgeVolume (example: 1Gi). Must be a valid storage size and is immutable once set.

ingestOperationConcurrency.description: Weight of concurrency for ingest operations (between 1 and 256).

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

EvictionConfig.description: Defines the configuration for eviction policies.

order.description: The order in which clean files will be evicted.

values.name: unordered
values.description: Evict files in an unordered manner.

minDelaySec.description: The number of seconds before a clean file is eligible for eviction.

IngestConfig.description: Defines the configuration for ingest policies.

order.description: The order in which dirty files will be uploaded.

values.name: oldest-first
values.description: Upload dirty files in the order of oldest first.

values.name: newest-first
values.description: Upload dirty files in the order of newest first.

minDelaySec.description: The minimum number of seconds before a dirty file is eligible for ingest.

StoragePoolConfig.description: Defines the configuration for creating a storage pool.

enabled.description: Whether to create a storage pool.

replicas.description: The number of replicas to create.

name.description: The name of the storage pool.

SyncSubvolume.description: SyncSubvolume is a custom resource that defines the configuration for synchronizing an EdgeSubvolume.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

SyncSubvolumeListResult.description: The response of a SyncSubvolume list operation.

value.description: The SyncSubvolume items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

SyncSubvolumeProperties.description: Defines the properties (spec) of the SyncSubvolume resource.

edgesubvolume.description: Name of the EdgeSubvolume to sync.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

clientId.description: The client ID for the workload identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID for the workload identity.

Azure.ResourceManager.ResourceUriParamet.name: resourceUri
Azure.ResourceManager.ResourceUriParamet.description: The fully qualified Azure Resource manager identifier of the resource.
